sentences.en: An intimate friendship grew up between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间渐渐产生了亲密的友情.

sentences.en: an intimate relationship
sentences.cn: 亲密的关系

sentences.en: Both felt that they had become very intimate.
sentences.cn: 两人都感到了他们之间已变得非常亲密.

sentences.en: He is my intimate.
sentences.cn: 他是我的至交.

sentences.en: He surprised me with his intimate knowledge of Kierkegaard and Schopenhauer.
sentences.cn: 他对克尔恺郭尔与叔本华的深刻了解让我很吃惊。

sentences.en: He was intimate with her.
sentences.cn: 他跟她有暧昧关系.

sentences.en: I can't tell them my intimate thoughts.
sentences.cn: 我不能告诉他们我内心深处的想法.

sentences.en: I have long been intimate with him.
sentences.cn: 我和他相识已久.

sentences.en: I just won't discuss my intimate relationships.
sentences.cn: 我就是不想讨论我的恋爱关系。

sentences.en: Mr Black went for the jugular, asking intimate sexual questions.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生直攻要害，问起了性方面的隐私问题。

sentences.en: Religion had an intimate association with alchemy during the Middle Ages.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪,宗教和炼金术密切相联.

sentences.en: She’s on intimate terms with people in government.
sentences.cn: 她与政府官员关系密切。

sentences.en: The cafe has an intimate but buzzy atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这个咖啡馆很温馨，但又有一种时尚的氛围。

sentences.en: the publication ofintimate details of their affair
sentences.cn: 他们暧昧关系中隐秘细节的公开

sentences.en: The two families are on intimate terms.
sentences.cn: 两家关系挺近.

sentences.en: The two of them are very intimate friends.
sentences.cn: 两人的关系很深.

sentences.en: The two of them were as intimate as sisters.
sentences.cn: 她们俩处得好像亲姐妹一样.

sentences.en: We're not on intimate terms with our neighbours.
sentences.cn: 我们和邻居来往不多。
